EmailTemplate.subject: CBE – Covid-19 Kit Replenishment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
My name is Chris Leblanc and I’m your Account Manager at Grand & Toy.
As of September 23, 2020, we are pleased to announce that you will be able to purchase select COVID-19 products from Grand & Toy.
Here is some information to help get you started:
When you log into Grand & Toy, please place COVID-19 product orders under the new COVID-19 account (ALIAS 21000-SUPCOVID), exclusively created for administrators of schools. A new landing page has also been created for your convenience, where you can easily access all these products. From the landing page, please click on the “Custom List” link to see your approved items.
Note: COVID-19 products are to ONLY be purchased on your COVID-19 Alias account. These products will not be available on any other alias accounts. If you do not see this account, please contact salessupport@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:salessupport@grandandtoy.com]]> for assistance. In your email include your Name, School Name and Contact #.
If you have any questions or require guidance/support regarding the COVID-19 Kit Replenishment program, I’m your point of contact and happy to help.
Best Regards,
Chris LeBlanc National Inside Account Manager
We have the business solutions to help you operate in the new normal.
